body.name: Smart Watch for Men Women, 1.85" Smartwatch (Answer/Make Call), IP68 Waterproof Fitness Tracker, 100+ Sport Modes, Heart Rate Monitor, Sleep Monitor, Pedometer, Smartwatches for Android iOS, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 52 mins
features: Make/Answer Calls & Read Message: The T50S smart watch is equipped with built-in HD speaker, after connecting to your smartphone via Bluetooth, you can directly use the smartwatch to answer or make calls. And it supports multiple smart reminders, including text, SNS messages (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, etc), daily reminder, etc. All notifications are displayed on your smartwatches and reminded by vibration, so that you will never miss any important information.

1.85'' HD Touch Screen & 200+ DIY Watch Faces: This womens smart watch is equipped with a 1.85" HD full touch color screen, delivering highly responsive touch, which can bring you a unique visual and better interactive experience. With the companion GloryFit app, you can download more than 200 free personalised watch faces and set it as your desktop. In addition, you can also select your favorite photo like family, selfie, pets photo, landscape photo, your car as a wallpaper in your smart watch.

24-Hour Health Monitoring: The fitness tracker is equipped with high-performance optical sensors that will record your all day activities. Fitness watch accurately monitors your heart rate in real time and it will monitor your sleep status automatically. You can view a week's worth of health reports in app. Wear your T50S smart watch correctly, not too tight nor too loose, leaving the skin room to breathe. This way not only do you feel comfortable, but the sensors also work properly.

100+ Sports Modes & IP68 Waterproof: The activity tracker supports 100+ sports modes, including Running, Walking, Hiking, Basketball, Boating, Climbing, Cycling, Fitness, Football and so on. During your exercise, it will record your data like heart rate, steps, calories burned, distance in real time. Sport watch is IP68 waterproof rating, ensuring worry-free use even while washing hands, face, or engaging in sweaty activities. However, it is not recommended for use in hot water or seawater.

Long Battery Life & Multifunctional: The smartwatches with a built-in large-capacity battery, which allows it to last about 5-7 days for daily use, and has a long standby time of about 30 days. Actual usage time is related to the user's usage. The mens smart watch is compatible with iOS 9.0 and Android 7.0 and above devices, it has multiple functions such as timer, stopwatch, alarm clock, sedentary reminder, music control, weather forecast, brightness adjustment, photo control, calculator, etc.

Functions such as sleep monitoring of the smartwatch need to be connected to the phone in the APP to work properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Sleek and stylish design- Bluetooth pairing works very well, including easy setup- Calls are crystal clear- Lots of useful functions- Accurate pedometer- Accurate heart rate reading- Long battery life (I’ve worn it for 36 hours straight and have completed 2 long workouts in that time and the battery is at 56%. This would never be possible with an Apple Watch.)Cons:- Grossly inaccurate measurement of calorie burn- Does not track total active minutesOverall the watch has an impressive number of features, an intuitive user interface, and extremely long battery life compared to the Apple Watch. If you don’t care about measurement of calories burned or tracking active minutes, this is a fantastic watch for the price.I’m returning it and going back to my Apple Watch solely because I want accurate calorie burn and a display of active minutes. I’m bummed though because my Apple Watch battery is usually dead after 18 hours so I have to charge it every night, and therefore can’t wear it for tracking sleep patterns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Smartwatch - A Perfect Blend of Style and Functionality and cost !
reviews.reviewText: I was first attracted to this because of the cost. We all know what the world famous smart watch costs.. and I dont need all the functions and apps .. I am looking to watch my heart rate , count steps and if available watch my OX level..This watch does so much more - however the core functions that I need, and obviously a watch are all in a package under $25.00. Ig you are looking for an Apple, or Samsung smartwatch - and the price tag that goes along with it fine, however if you only need a subset of the applications at a subset of the price congratulations you have found a great alternative.I have tried my hardest to give this a great wear test and the strap is made of a silicone like material that does not make me sweat, and is strong enough for normal use, The watch charges and syncs with your phone like those "others" so for my money this is a great functional watch..They always say think twice and buy only what you need.. This covers so many bases that I cannot see how it wouldn't be a serious contender for anyone looking to buy a smartwatch. Here are some of my more technical thoughts based on functionality..Sleek Design and Build:The sleek and stylish design and the white color and the IP68 waterproof feature ensures durability, making it suitable for various activities, from workouts to everyday wear.Versatile Calling and Messaging:The ability to answer and make calls directly from the smartwatch is cool. It brings convenience, especially when my phone is not readily accessible. The seamless integration with Android and iOS devices ensures compatibility for all users.lots of Sport Modes and Fitness Tracking:With over 100 sport modes, this smartwatch caters to every fitness enthusiast's needs. The precision in tracking various activities, coupled with the heart rate monitor, sleep monitor, and pedometer, provides a comprehensive overview of my healthIntuitive User Interface:Navigating through the smartwatch is a breeze thanks to its user-friendly interface. The 1.85" display is vibrant and responsive, enhancing the overall user experience. The clear visuals make it easy to check notifications, track fitness progress,Long Battery Life:Even with frequent use and continuous heart rate monitoring, the smartwatch maintains a long-lasting charge, eliminating the need for constant recharging.Comprehensive Health Monitoring:The smartwatch goes beyond basic fitness tracking. The heart rate monitor provides real-time data, and the sleep monitor offers valuable insights into my sleep patterns.Seamless Compatibility and App Integration:Connecting the smartwatch to my Android device was seamless, and the integration with various apps enhances its usefulness.Jam packed with features at a price that cant be beat...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Smart watch for your money
reviews.reviewText: Good battery life. I can connect to this app through its own app as well. Easy to use and has all the features of smart watch. I can get all my calls on the watch and track my steps. Durable and has lots of cool features to simplify my life goals. Exactly what I wanted which has nice design and looks and can also track heart beat monitor health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Watch, Must Buy!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch for my husband as a gift. He absolutely loves it. It was easy to connect to phone too. He loves all the functionality it provides. He really likes tracking his steps and sleep. Easy to receive phone calls when your hands are full. Definitely a great watch for the price. It's a must buy, you won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my Donerton Smart Watch for Men Women, 1.85" Smartwatch. This watch has a lot of features!! It took some work to get set up, but despite all the features it was not overly difficult. Some were basic things like changing the time to 12 hour vs. 24 hour, weather degrees from Centigrade to Fahrenheit, centimeters to inches and kg to lbs. I just had to find where to make those changes. Connecting to my phone was easy. The face is large and bright and there are many different looks to choose from. The band is soft and comfortable. Still working with the app. I am very happy with my new smart watch and I hope it will last a long while. Hopefully longer than my previous one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool Gadget for your wrist
reviews.reviewText: Good battery life. I can connect to this app through its own app as well. Easy to use and has all the features of smart watch. I can get all my calls on the watch and track my steps. Durable and has lots of cool features to simplify my life goals. Exactly what I wanted which has nice design and looks and can also track heart beat monitor health.

Ho avuto la fortuna di poterlo comprare ad un prezzo scontato e devo dire che lo smartwatch è davvero valido. Rapporto qualità prezzo ottimo. E' molto comodo leggero non lo senti al polso e poi ha molte funzionalità tra quelle sportive e non. Io non uso più gli apparecchi per misurare pressione, ossigeno nel sangue etcc. Puoi tenere lo stato del cuore sempre sotto osservazione. Ti aiuta a rispettare il tempo di inatttività ti avverte che è ora di muoversi un pò. Poi è comodo per sapere il ciclo del sonno veglia.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch for my husband as I have purchased one previously and am very happy with it. Its a very nice watch with lots of features such as making/ receiving calls, texts, messages, blood pressure monitoring and counting steps. Very easy setup with Bluetooth and my husband was up and running in under 2 minutes. Would highly recommend this watch if you're looking for an affordable and stylish smart watch.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es bonito, aguanta el jupe de todo el día y la batería dura una eternidad
reviews.reviewText: Lo necesitaba para hacer seguimiento de la actividad física, como los pasos y cualquier característica relacionada con la salud, y puedo decir que estoy extremadamente satisfecho con su funcionalidad. A este precio, este reloj inteligente es probablemente la mejor opción sin tener que arruinarte con su compra. Es una gran opción para un uso diario, monitorizando tu actividad y funciones vitales, y siendo extremadamente útil la aplicación en el móvil con el que controlarlo. Las llamadas son buenas, el emparejamiento con el móvil sencillo y rápido, y la configuración intuitiva.La mensajería funciona bien, aunque he de decir que no uso más que WhatsApp y SMS, por lo que no puedo hablar de otras aplicaciones. Puedes ajustar las unidades (Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kg, Libras, etc.) en la aplicación de forma rápida. Además, se agradece poder usar la hora en formato 24h sin AM o PM, estándar en España.Una característica destacada es la capacidad de personalizar la pantalla de inicio del reloj inteligente según me apetezca y necesite. Aprecio las funciones adicionales como un cronómetro y la capacidad de configurar alarmas directamente en el reloj inteligente, lo que lo hace conveniente y funcional.Es una opción barata, segura y muy conveniente. Aguanta ser sumergido y tiene pinta de que me va a durar mucho tiempo que, al fin y al cabo, es lo que importa.

Pour être honnête, je ne m'attendais pas à une telle qualité tant on peut trouver tout et n'importe quoi au niveau des montres connectées.J'ai été agréablement surpris par la qualité globale de la montre et plus particulièrement par son écran. La résolution est parfaite pour lire les notifications et naviguer facilement dans les menus. Le tactile est très précis et réactif. La luminosité de la montre est parfaite et permet d'être utilisée même lorsque qu'il y a beaucoup de lumière.Les différents modes de la montre sont fonctionnels et faciles à utiliser. Les capteurs sont précis et permettent d'avoir des mesures fiables. Le fait de pouvoir passer des appels bluetooth est génial pour un prix si faible.L'application est très agréable à utiliser et permet un grand nombre de réglages.Le prix est très intéressant compte tenu de la qualité d'ensemble.

reviews.reviewTitle: TOP Smartwatch für einen geringen Preis!
reviews.reviewText: Ich bin leidenschaftliche Smartwatch Trägerin jedoch muss ich sagen, dass ich von dieser hier sehr positiv überrascht bin. Als ich den Preis sah habe ich mir nicht all zu viel Hoffnung gemacht jedoch die Uhr hat meine Erwartungen übertroffen!Die Qualität, die vielen Funktionen und das Design sind perfekt! Die Beschreibung und Installation sind super einfach.Die Uhr ist außerdem auch super einafach zum Handhaben und auch sehr angenehm zum Tragen.Der Akku hält ca. 10 Tage.Ein weiterer Pluspunkt für die Uhr ist - ein personalisierbarer Hintergrund (eigenes Foto z.B.).Fazit: Der Preis ist mehr als super für die vielen Funktionen die die Uhr bietet!Von mir eine klare Kaufempfehlung!
